name: The Bush Whacker
description: Whacks them bushes good... still getting used to whacking monsters.

name: Jim the Lumberjack
description: Can fell a tree with a single blow. Are monsters all that different?

name: Emo Werewolf
description: Maybe he didn't get the girl, or maybe he did. Either way, he's sad.

name: Sasha the Fierce Warrior
description: Sasha may be friendly, but that doesn't mean that she isn't fierce.

name: The Washed Up Hermit
description: He used to be an adventurer like you, until he took an arrow to the knee. Now he's an adventurer like you with an extra knee-arrow.

name: Detective Kaine
description: Uses his skills of observation to exploit the enemies' weaknesses!

name: The Princess
description: She's a little spoiled, but she's got a talent for making things burn, so you may as well have her on your side.

name: Natalie Dragon
description: Nate's older sister never fumbles. Her skill with daggers is nigh unmatched.

name: Jason, Master of Shadows
description: Jason spends his time lurking in the shadows, waiting for unsuspecting prey to pass.

name: Artaxes, the Lion
description: Artaxes lusts for power. He never really got enough.

name: Khouri, the Witch Doctor
description: No one's sure where he came from, but he seems keen to help.

name: Dark Gryphon
description: 10 points for Gryphon-dor!

name: Sarah, the Collector
description: Sarah wants all the items. All of them.

name: Gold Panda
description: Not that unlike all your other companions, but more shiny.

name: Prince Sal, the Merman
description: He's the best fighter the merfolks have to offer.

name: Fire Phoenix
description: This phoenix will object to almost everything and she is almost always right. Converts DPS into gold.

name: King Reginald IV
description: He spent the better part of the last 10 years hunting down a Unicorn for the Princess, but he's pretty much retired now.

name: Thalia, the Thunder King
description: Spends his time throwing lightning at people who try to dabble in the arcane arts.

name: Merci, the Mad Wizard
description: At least he's polite.

name: Nate Dragon
description: Not the most competent hero in the world, but he'll get the job done.

name: Mister the Monkey
description: All about the monkey business!

name: Pete the Carney
description: The clown you can afford.

name: Wendy the Witch
description: She's such a wyrdo.

name: Jack O'Lantern
description: He's a great pumpkin of Irish descent.

name: RoboTurkey
description: Last year's model.

name: Momma Kaine
description: The best culinary scientist there is.

name: RoboSanta
description: More efficient than the flesh and magic based model.

name: Frosty the Snowman
description: Store in a dry and cool place.

name: Pilot Pam
description: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's Pilot Pam!

name: Queen Siri
description: "Let's start a matriarchy."

name: Groklok the Orc
description: The world's most versatile orc!

name: Drizzle the Dark Elf
description: She works with Groklok to boost his abilities!

name: Rocky the Rockstar
description: Plays lead guitar in the band 'Ratmouse'

name: Sally the Succubus
description: Beware her seductive seduction.

name: Larry the Leprechaun
description: You'll never find his pot o' gold! Unless you find it in a chest.

name: Kyle the Party Bro
description: Party on, party bro!

name: Alan the ArchAngel
description: The light will burn you!

name: RoboRabbit
description: Clicking circuits enabled.

name: The Bat Billionaire
description: I'm Bat Billionaire.

name: The Metal Soldierette
description: More monsters? Oh, come on!

name: Broot
description: I am Broot.

name: Robbie Raccoon
description: Let's blow some stuff up! C'mon!

name: Leerion, the Royal Dwarf
description: The world's favorite dwarf!

name: Brogon, Prince of Dragons
description: Party on, prince bro!

name: Montana James
description: He's named after his family's dog, Montana.

name: Serpent King Draco
description: Sssimply assstonissshing.

name: President Billy Smithsonian
description: Long live the President.

name: Kizlblyp, the Alien Traitor
description: She's working for us now.

name: Ranger Rayna
description: She ranges about quite rangerly.

name: Littlefoot
description: Bigfoot's little sister and key rival.

name: Veronica, the Android Archer
description: She has a somewhat unfair advantage.

name: Bubba, the Swimming Orc
description: He may be an orc, but he's like a fish in the water.

name: Karen, the Cat Teenager
description: She's purrrrrfect.

name: Mr. Boggins, the Substitute
description: He'll teach you a lesson.

name: The Exterminator
description: Prepare to be exterminated.

name: The Shadow Queen
description: You cannot destroy a shadow.

name: Greyskull the Pirate
description: Arr! Avast matey! Swaggy swag 'n all that!

name: Gloria, the Good Witch
description: Have you been a good little Crusader?

name: Ilsa, the Insane Wizard
description: Burn! Burn 'em all!

name: Eiralon, the Blood Mage
description: My magic may be forbidden, but you need my power.

name: Priestess of Time
description: All possibilities are open to me.

name: Mindy the Mime
description: She doesn't say much.

name: The Half-Blood Elf
description: Half Elf. Half Orc. Completely nuts.

name: Henry, the Scaredy-Ghoul
description: It's tough work being scary, especially when you're scared.

name: Fright-o-Tron 4000
description: Tirelessly programmed to elicit maximum terror.

name: Graham the Driver
description: Tuscon to Las Vegas and back again.

name: Paul the Pilgrim
description: He's just looking for a new place to settle.

name: Petra the Pilgrim
description: She's on the prowl for some prime real estate.

name: The Dark Helper
description: She actually is very helpful, once you get to know her.

name: RoboRudolph
description: His nose is an LED! It'll shine for hundreds of years without breaking!

name: Bernard the Bartender
description: He'll mix you a drink that makes you stronger!

name: Princess Val the Mermaid
description: She's not to be messed with. She's a princess, after all.

name: Karl the Kicker
description: You don't want to be standing in front of him when he's kicking.

name: Cindy the Cheer-Orc
description: Give me a D! Give me a P! Give me an S! Goooo DPS!

name: Warwick the Warlock
description: What? You've never heard of a leprechaun warlock?

name: Katie the Cupid
description: She'll shoot you right through the heart!

name: Snickette the Sneaky
description: Sneaky like a fox!

name: Squiggles the Clown
description: He HATES royalty for reasons he's not up to sharing.

name: Arachnobuddy
description: Arachnobuddy, Arrachnobuddy, does whatever makes monsters bloody

name: Foresight
description: My body is Synthetic, but my DPS is real

name: Baenarall, Angel of Hope
description: Hope, descending on a ray of light.

name: Sisaron the Dragon Sorceress
description: Who will stand beside the Dragon sorceress?

name: Spaceking
description: Come on! You know? Spaceking?

name: Grandmora
description: Still a hatchling at heart.

name: Turps the Tasty
description: Who wouldn't want a Crusader dressed in a Jaffa Cake costume?

name: Sjin the Builder
description: He's way better at building than Bob.

name: Danni the Daring Damsel
description: She's not as innocent as she seems.

name: Polly the Parrot
description: Squaaaaaaaawk! Gimme a cracker!

name: Slisiblyp, the Alien Scientist
description: She likes to perform experiments.

name: Red, the Ace Pilot
description: She's the best damn pilot in the outer rim.

name: Agent 79
description: The rising star of the Crusader Intelligence Agency.

name: RoboQueen
description: Adept at rapid execution.

name: Zombie Winter
description: He knows nothing.

name: Penny the Park Planner
description: Mostly the plan is to not burn it down.

name: Beary McBearFace
description: Bet you think that's real funny, don't you?

name: The Goldhound
description: No one fools this hound.

name: Milgrid the Mining Mage
description: She's no minor miner.

name: Willy the Weregoat
description: One gruff customer.

name: The Exchange Student
description: Look out, there's a new dragon on the block.

name: Chiyome
description: Omae wa mou shindeiru.

name: Viktor the Vampire
description: He's a sucker for a good formation.

name: James the Seated
description: All hail the supreme chair man.

name: Chef Casey
description: Monsters are just another ingredient.

name: Xander, the Xmas Dragon
description: They made a song for a glowing reindeer, but not a DRAGON?

name: Shenna the Centaur
description: Half-human, half-horse, all attitude.

name: Griz the Robo-Coach
description: His methods are harsh, but statistically sound.

name: Frankie the Demon Crooner
description: Fly him to hell, let him play among the damned.

name: Saint Patrokia
description: All she asks is a little faith.

name: Biff the Magic Rabbit
description: He's ready to dish out a healthy dose of beta-carotene.

name: Thoonoose
description: The most powerful being in the universe: some purple guy.

name: The Holy Guardian
description: The wholly holy guardian of a sacred garden.

name: Rex the Wrestler
description: Nothing goes over this guy's head.

name: Skeletom
description: He can neither live nor breathe video games, but he sure likes them.

name: The Game Goblin
description: The delivery man is his only friend.

name: First Lady Betty Smithsonian
description: She's been calling the shots all along.

name: The Wolf King
description: His senses are sharp, but his claws are sharper.

name: Dr. Evil, PhD
description: Criminally misunderstood.

name: Rosie the Rocklechaun
description: A rock leprechaun is a rocklechaun. Don't ask why.

name: Zoraeban, Demonic Angel
description: Part angel, part demon, all alone.

name: Sashimi the Seal
description: This seal's the real deal.

name: Kathleen the Chaotic
description: Chaos for the bus god!

name: Trixie the Treater
description: Trick or treat! Smell my feet!

name: 43G1S
description: The 43rd generation defensive droid from One Systems.

name: Wrena the Fair
description: Harsh, but fair.

name: Bruno the Unicorn
description: Finally, the unicorn that The Princess always wanted.

name: Nargulg Granitehand
description: Result of a rare union, source of a rare bruisin'.

name: Ishtar
description: Subject of worship, or threat to existence? You decide.

name: Ana Guinness
description: A stout-hearted lass with absolutely no brand affiliations.

name: Deathpuddle
description: Acutely aware that he's in a video game, and of who he's based on.

name: Bridget the Painter
description: A master of many artforms, but egg painting is her favorite.

name: Holddoor
description: We are what we do. Holddoor holds the door.

name: Mycall the Mushroom
description: Cute as a button mushroom!

name: Xygallix
description: A mechanic... from SPACE?!

name: Kebos the Mummy
description: Been a while, crocodile.

name: Arenvarr the Beheaded
description: The severed, rejoined in death.

name: Langley the Conductor
description: By clicking here, you agree to the code of conductors.

name: Euodia the Fencer
description: Beware her labyrinthine swordplay.

name: Aphelion the Distant
description: Always distant, but always there.

name: Carmen and Petunia
description: Good things come in twos!

name: The Evanescent
description: The luminous alight to battle.

name: The Desert Bus
description: The most driven Crusader of all.

name: Gemthel the Gourmet
description: The palate of a generation.

name: Kris, the Enraged Elemental
description: Someone's got their needles in a knot!

name: Jiaolong the Guardian
description: Spirit of the endless river.
